app_name: BeautyCam Selfie - Photos Selfie Portrait Editor
app_detail:
â¦ BeautyCam Selfie - Photos Selfie Portrait Editor help take a selfie with smooth skin and best skin tone without blemish

â§ Easy to use and become a natural beauty just one click. Special and free filters with personality to spice up your selfie. 

â§ Change different poses and snap away until you get the desired photo, makeup finished in seconds.

Installed this selfie app with pretty filters, you can snapshot video anywhere, anytime.

ğŸ’– BeautyCam Selfie - Photos Selfie Portrait Editor specially designed for selfie lovers who can't stop clicking, make your photos lively and colourful with fantastical filters on whole pic or part of it. We have created an amazing selfie camera with effects to enhance the beauty, ensure your picture will be beautiful but still retain the natural beauty. Beautiful Camera is like a magic camera to help you create extremely unique and beautiful selfies.

ğŸ¥ƒ Create beautiful and natural looking photo and video selfies every time. Touch up selfies by erasing blemishes, smoothing skin, brightening eyes, whitening teeth, and contouring skin. Make photos pop with filters, blur tools, and enhanced lighting. Get creative with special effects, augmented reality filters, magic brush and so much more!

ğŸ¥ Features 

âœ¸ Beauty camera and photo filters
âœ¸ Snapshot camera face effect
âœ¸ Adjustable skin tone gives you a radiant complexion.
âœ¸Filter camera beauty effects
âœ¸ Real-time filter camera
âœ¸Face makeup camera
âœ¸ Beautify and widen eyes with pouch eliminating to be more charming.
âœ¸Beauty makeover photo editor 
âœ¸Face makeup photo app
âœ¸ Add stickers. Photo mosaic. Add text on photo. Crop, rotate photos. Adjust the contrast, temperature ...
âœ¸ Record video with magic filters or animated selfie effects
âœ¸ Video sticker camera. Selfie camera with stickers
âœ¸ Unique beauty for you selfie editor and camera
âœ¸ The auto makeup camera app
âœ¸ Professional photo processing makes it possible to possess photo in high quality with a slider.
âœ¸ Selfie stickers camera
âœ¸ Smaller and straight nose in a second with a supernatural way.
âœ¸ Selfie editor makeover effects
âœ¸ Besides powerful makeup function, there are also motion stickers and video camera.
âœ¸ Capture video with lovely effects
âœ¸ Free selfie editor and camera

ğŸ’ With BeautyCam Selfie - Photos Selfie Portrait Editor you can choose different retouching levels and saturation of makeup effect according to your skin tone and specific blemishes. Take a candy selfie with HD Camera, or choose a photo from the gallery, dozens of filters and makeup effects help you to beautify photos in a smart way. One tap to possess models figure by legs and body slimming.
